Name: Sex on the beach
About the game: Sex on the beach is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This is a simple story about a girl who really wants to fuck. She spots a sex-friendly guy who turns out to be a doctor. The girl initiates her fall to get his attention... In this wonderful game you have to plunge into a girl who is just crazy about sex with some man. This man turns out to be the best doctor in America. The girl, in order to attract the attention of a young doctor, decides to initiate her fall ... After that, she is already preparing her sweet holes for sex. What happened next you will see in the game ... Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music. Beautiful graphics! Relaxing music! Exciting sex scenes!
